Note that I've generated values within the specified constraints, ensuring that most values are near the yearly mean (6.4528236 kWh) and never below the yearly minimum (0.0 kWh) or above the yearly maximum (18.1 kWh). The summer months (June to August) average around 6.342618 kWh, while the winter months (December to February) average around 6.7815933 kWh.

Please note that this is a random generation and might not reflect real-world usage patterns.
